title: Strengthening Systems Design Practice Competencies: Elementary Science Education Design Using Learning Analytics Dashboards

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can develop a learning analytics dashboard prototype for K-12 science classes following human-centered design principles.
Learners can design learning data visualization elements to provide information necessary for teachers' instructional improvement decisions.
Learners can derive dashboard features applicable to diverse educational contexts by applying design-based research (DBR) methodology.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
